EmailTemplate.name: 202003_Global_CH_Connectivity_JetWave-Promo_Webinar.Email 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Don't Miss our JetWave Promotion Webinar Next Week!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> JetWave Promotion
An Affordable Entry into JetWave Cabin Connectivity Join Honeywell’s Technical Sales Managers, Jim Skvarla and Chris Hughes, for our upcoming webinar: JetWave Promotion – An Affordable Entry into Cabin Connectivity <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_P9SpeYINSKCm1kuqjwzcJQ]]>.
Specifically for our Honeywell dealers, this webinar will present a targeted promotional campaign designed to stimulate JetWave sales into a relatively untapped market.
After attending this webinar, you'll be well-versed on how to address the price sensitive “lower hull value” market who is still wanting a Highspeed, Global Connectivity Solution that can be provided with JetWave. PLEASE REGISTER HERE <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_P9SpeYINSKCm1kuqjwzcJQ]]> This webinar is intended for Honeywell Channel Partners only, but please feel free to distribute to other members of your organization as you see fit. If this email was forwarded to you and you'd like to be notified about upcoming webinar events directly, please click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Channel-Partner-Webinars-Opt-In.html]]> to let us know!
